title: Chris's chicken tikka masala
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ghee (clarified butter)', '1 onion, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '400ml tomato passata', '235ml double cream', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cubed', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder']
